existing_features.title: When a player wins any mini-game, show a short “sweet love message” popup overlay in addition to the existing win celebration effects (and before/alongside the Rewards modal). The popup must appear for both first-time wins and repeat wins, and it must automatically dismiss after a short duration (e.g., 2–4 seconds) without requiring user interaction.

Add a reusable UI implementation for the win love-message popup (new component) and wire it into the win-handling flow in the game section so it resets correctly when the user plays again or returns to the menu.

new_feature_requests.summary: Show a sweet love message popup when the player wins the game

projectName: Show a sweet love message popup when the player wins a mini-game
